caption.p: Plots illustrating the observed versus the predicted sample location-level HIV prevalence (A) and the observed versus the predicted number of HIV cases (B) among young adults (women 15–24 years and men 15–29 years) for the combined ‘full’ best-fitting multiple multilevel regression model per DHS sample location for 7 countries of Eastern and Southern Africa (also see S9 Table).
Click here for additional data file.
